Hypertable::DropTableDispatchHandler

Hypertable::DropTableDispatchHandler Class Reference

This class is a DispatchHandler class that is used for collecting asynchronous drop table requests. More...

Detailed Description

This class is a DispatchHandler class that is used for collecting asynchronous drop table requests.

Definition at line 107 of file DropTableDispatchHandler.cc.

void DropTableDispatchHandler::handle ( EventPtr &  event_ptr  )  [virtual]

Dispatch method.

This gets called by the AsyncComm layer when an event occurs in response to a previously sent request that was supplied with this dispatch handler.

Parameters:
event_ptr shared pointer to event object
